original_text: As soon as Solomon finished his prayer, fire came down from heaven and consumed the burnt offering and the sacrifices, and the glory of the Lord filled the temple.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 기도를 마치매 불이 하늘에서부터 내려와서 그 번제물과 제물들을 사르고 여호와의 영광이 그 성전에 가득하니

sentences.original_text: As soon as Solomon finished his prayer,
and consumed the burnt offering and the sacrifices,
and the glory of the Lord filled the temple.
